description: Identifier of the asset the coverage applies to (likely the equipment header unique ID); used as a foreign key to link an extended warranty to a specific vehicle/unit; confirm with SME.
Code indicating the program or plan type of the extended warranty. Mapping of codes to meanings is maintained by the business; confirm with SME.
Unit used to measure coverage and expiration (e.g., time or meter-based such as years, months, hours, odometer); interpreted with EWCycleLength to determine limits. Confirm unit mapping with SME.
Numeric limit for the cycle unit defining coverage duration or meter cap when combined with EWCycle; used to compute warranty expiration.
Coverage start reference: either an in-service date (YYYYMMDD) or initial meter reading, depending on EWCycle. 0 or blank indicates unknown; used to calculate expiration.
Coverage end reference: either an expiration date (YYYYMMDD) or terminal meter value, depending on EWCycle/EWCycleLength. May be stored directly or derived.
Amount paid to purchase the extended warranty coverage (currency).
Customer deductible amount per claim under the extended warranty (currency).
Name of the dealer or provider associated with this extended warranty contract.
Providerâ€™s contract or policy identifier for the extended warranty.
